about_the_game:
It's time for the Great Tournament! Choose one of eight girl fighters - the strongest masters of hand-to-hand combat. Each participant of the tournament has a unique fighting style, and with intuitive input system, you will easily learn the strengths of fighters and can perform spectacular combos, even if you have never played fighting games!
You can fight against your opponents in quick-fight mode, or immerse yourself in a story campaign that will evolve depending on the chosen heroine.

Eight stories.
  • Each of the participants of the Great Tournament has her own story, her own character and her own goals, but only you will decide which of them you will lead to victory.
Eight fighting styles.
  • A simple and clear combat system will allow you to fully unlock the potential of heroines, each of whom has her own unique fighting style.
Skill Testing.
  • The training mode and challenges will help you learn combat techniques better.
Unlockable materials.
  • Explore Cado city in the story campaign, improve your combat skills in training mode, and win the Great Tournament. For these actions, you will be rewarded with in-game coins that you can spend to unlock illustrations about the game world and the stories of the tournament participants.

Developers.
  • Cado: The Great Tournament is developed by only two people - Mark Zakharov and Valdemar Zakharov.
    Red Crystal games are created entirely by our own efforts without the use of third-party assets or hiring.
    We are eager to realize our ideas in games and grow in their creation!
